pages.text: Wildwood trees were once found throughout the world, but since the $(l:concepts/the_fey)the Fading$() the magic that sustained them decayed.$(br2)Now, all that remains are their withered $(l:herbs/wildroot)roots: wildroot$().$(br2)$(info) Some collectors have magically preserved saplings of the tree, but these are rare and expensive.

pages.title: Rituals
pages.text: Instead, a canny wild mage may utilise the $(l:rituals/ritual_wildroot_growth)Wildroot Growth$() ritual to germinate and grow such a tree from the wildroot crop itself.$(br2)The resulting wildroot, and the $(l:resources/bark#dark_oak)bark$() obtained from it are used in many recipes, rituals and spells.$(br2)Additionally, wildwood can be used $(l:crafting/wildwood)decoratively$() in many ways.
